gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.io
Class BlankNodesPolicy

java.lang.Object
  gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.io.BlankNodesPolicy

public abstract class BlankNodesPolicy
extends Object

Defines a policy regarding how to create blank node identifiers while parsing an input.

Author:
Andreou Dimitris, email: jim.andreou (at) gmail (dot) com

Constructor Summary
protected BlankNodesPolicy()
           
 
Method Summary
static BlankNodesPolicy asDeclared()
          Returns a BlankNodesPolicy which keeps the local blank node identifiers.
abstract  String createIdentifier(String localIdentifier)
          Creates a blank node identifier, given the identifier defined in the input, which formally has only local (file-wide) scope.
static BlankNodesPolicy globallyUnique()
          Returns a BlankNodesPolicy which throws away local identifiers and uses globally unique identifiers instead.

Constructor Detail

BlankNodesPolicy

protected BlankNodesPolicy()
Method Detail

createIdentifier

public abstract String createIdentifier(String localIdentifier)
Creates a blank node identifier, given the identifier defined in the input, which formally has only local (file-wide) scope.

Parameters:
localIdentifier - the local identifier of the blank node
Returns:
a blank node identifier to use instead of the local one

globallyUnique

public static BlankNodesPolicy globallyUnique()
Returns a BlankNodesPolicy which throws away local identifiers and uses globally unique identifiers instead. (Global in the scope of the executing virtual machine and the class loader that loaded this class).

Returns:
a BlankNodesPolicy which throws away local identifiers and uses globally unique identifiers instead

asDeclared

public static BlankNodesPolicy asDeclared()
Returns a BlankNodesPolicy which keeps the local blank node identifiers. Note that this may lead to conflicts, if the same identifier is used in two separate RDF files (these blank node identifiers are not in the same scope and do not identify the same blank node, thus the conflict if they are treated as same).

Returns:
a BlankNodesPolicy which keeps the local blank node identifiers
